alert.note: Alert for Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 06 at 2:00PM PST until March 08 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet above 2000 feet with 1 to 10 inches down to 1000 feet. * WHERE...Shasta Lake Area / Northern Shasta County. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Downed trees and tree limbs with power outages are possible due to heavy snow and gusty winds. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels 1000 to 2000 feet. Heaviest snow through early Tuesday morning and again Tuesday night. There will be dry periods on Tuesday, though travel impacts may continue.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County
